name: Big Dog Run
description:
Idle Thumbs / Big Dog fan game from 2014

This is kind of a Wizard Jam game from a time before Wizard Jam even existed. I realized I never had uploaded this to itch for some reason so here it is.

It's very short and straightforward so you don't miss much if you just watch the playthrough here ;)

Original forum thread https://www.idlethumbs.net/forums/topic/9244-big-dog-run-a-video-game-tribute-to...
